title: Highlighter Documentation updates
description: Various places in the Highlighter documentation refer to bytes (i.e. SimpleFragmenter) when it should be chars.  See http://www.gossamer-threads.com/lists/lucene/java-user/56986

comments.content: Update for highlighter.   Deprecates byte related stuff in favor of chars in the naming of variable and accessors, even though the underlying functionality is still the same.
comments.author: Grant Ingersoll
